languages.text: "Дверка, из видений моих, я вам рассказывала, помните? Так, мелочи, всего лишь моя последняя надежда на спасение."
"The door from my visions! The one I told you about, remember? Nothing major, just my last hope for salvation."
languages.original_text: "Дверка, из видений моих, я вам рассказывала, помните? Так, мелочи, всего лишь моя последняя надежда на спасение."

traits.locale_text: "The door from my visions! The one I gold you about, remember? Just a small thing, just my last hope for salvation."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The door from my visions! The one I told you about, remember? Nothing major, just my last hope for salvation."

languages.text: “是我在幻象里见过的那扇门！我之前和你说过，还记得吗？不是什么大不了的事情，不过是我获得救赎的最后希望罢了。”
languages.original_text: "The door from my visions! The one I told you about, remember? Nothing major, just my last hope for salvation."

traits.locale_text: “是我在幻象里见过的那扇门！我之前和你说过，还记得吗？不是什么大不了的事情，不过是我获得救赎的最后希望罢了。”
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: « La porte de mes visions ! Je vous en ai déjà parlé, vous vous souvenez ? C'est juste mon dernier espoir de salut, rien de bien important. »
languages.original_text: "The door from my visions! The one I told you about, remember? Nothing major, just my last hope for salvation."

traits.locale_text: « La porte de mes visions ! Je vous en ai déjà parlé, vous vous souvenez ? C'est juste mon dernier espoir de salut, rien de bien important. »
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Das Tor aus meinen Visionen! Ich habe Euch davon erzählt, wisst Ihr noch? Nichts Wichtiges, nur meine letzte Hoffnung auf Erlösung."
languages.original_text: "The door from my visions! The one I told you about, remember? Nothing major, just my last hope for salvation."

traits.locale_text: "Das Tor aus meinen Visionen! Ich habe Euch davon erzählt, wisst Ihr noch? Nichts Wichtiges, nur meine letzte Hoffnung auf Erlösung."
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: «¡La puerta de mis visiones! ¿Recuerda que le hablé de ella? No es gran cosa, solo mi última esperanza de salvación».
languages.original_text: "The door from my visions! The one I told you about, remember? Nothing major, just my last hope for salvation."

traits.locale_text: «¡La puerta de mis visiones! ¿Recuerda que le hablé de ella? No es gran cosa, solo mi última esperanza de salvación».
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: 「ビジョンで見た扉！あなたに話したでしょ？大したことじゃないわ。救いのための最後の希望よ」
languages.original_text: "The door from my visions! The one I told you about, remember? Nothing major, just my last hope for salvation."

traits.locale_text: 「ビジョンで見た扉！あなたに話したでしょ？大したことじゃないわ。救いのための最後の希望よ」
traits.speaker: IdiraCompanion

languages.text: "Görülerimdeki kapı! Söylemiştim ya, unuttun mu? Çok da mühim değil, kurtuluş için kalan tek umudum sadece."
languages.original_text: "The door from my visions! The one I told you about, remember? Nothing major, just my last hope for salvation."
